name: Mechanics: Ball in Bucket
description:
If you have ever played with construction sets or Apparatus sets and have loved the brain-stimulating challenge, then Meccano for iOS is right up your alley. Meccano is a game of logic and creativity. When you combine both these two, you can be sure that it’s also a game that’s a sure shot booster for all the blank moments we start to have with age.

Your aim is simple to build a construction that helps the ball to come into the bucket. That is not as simple as it sounds.
